title: Dark Souls: Remastered (2018) RePack from qoob MULTi11
description:
Description:
Dark Souls: Remastered - this is the re-release of the very first part of the cult role-playing series, which offers players a smart graphics, an increased number of frames per second, various balanced edits. Also, the game received a few small balance changes, an updated arrangement of bonfires (for example, a new bonfire was added to the blacksmith-skeleton of Vamos), as well as various visual updates. Dark Souls Remastered boasts support for resolutions up to 4K, stable frames at 60 frames per second, even in Blythtown, as well as other technical improvements. The edition contains the main game and addition "Artorias from the Abyss".

Information: 
Year : 2018 
Genre : RPG, Action, Dark-Fantasy , 3rd-Person, 3D 
Developer : QLOC 
Publisher : FromSoftware, Inc, BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment 
Publication Type : RePack 
Platform : PC 
Language : Russian, English, MULTi11 
Language Voice : English 
Medicine : vshito (CODEX)

Features:
▪Gloomy universe with a rich history. 
▪Every death is just a new beginning. 
▪Variety and richness of gaming opportunities. 
▪The key to success is learning and mastery. 
▪Unique network mode (up to 6 players and dedicated servers).

Features repack:
▪Based on the release of CODEX 
▪Version of the game - 1.01 / 1.02 
▪Installation ~ 7 minutes 
▪RePack from qoob // pZLib library from Razor12911
